net.joala.condition

Interface ConditionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConditionFactory

    public interface ConditionFactory

    Interface for factories providing conditions.

    Since:
    8/22/12

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BooleanCondition booleanCondition(Expression<Boolean> expression)
      Create a boolean condition which allows some convenience methods for assertions and assumptions.
      <T> Condition<T> condition(Expression<T> expression)
      Create a ready to use condition.

    • Method Detail

      • booleanCondition

        @Nonnull
BooleanCondition booleanCondition(@Nonnull
                                        Expression<Boolean> expression)

        Create a boolean condition which allows some convenience methods for assertions and assumptions.

        Parameters:
        expression - the expression which will evaluate to a boolean value
        Returns:
        boolean condition
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if expression is null

      • condition

<T> Condition<T> condition(@Nonnull
                                 Expression<T> expression)

        Create a ready to use condition.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type the expression value will have
        Parameters:
        expression - the expression which will evaluate to value of type T
        Returns:
        condition
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if expression is null
